article.author: Wallace Bell
article.title: James Gunn Reacts to Peacemaker's Intro Dance Being Recreated At a Talent Show
article.excerpt: James Gunn reacts to a high-school talent competition that recreates the dance sequence from Peacemaker, claiming that the original was shot in a comparable auditorium.
content: A videotape of the Peacemaker introduction dance routine being replicated for a high school talent event has prompted director James Gunn to respond. The series, which stars John Cena as the titular hero/antihero, is a direct spinoff from James Gunn's The Suicide Group, and follows the vicious mercenary as he is recruited by Amanda Waller's A.R.G.U.S. to join another black ops squad. They've been tasked with dealing with an extraterrestrial menace in the shape of parasitic butterfly-like organisms who've taken up residence in human bodies.

Gunn established the tone for his series with an exhilarating, choreographed introduction dance sequence set to Wig Wam's "Do You Wanna Taste It?" Gunn set the tone for his series with an exhilarating, choreographed introductory dance sequence set to Wig Wam's "Do You Wanna Taste It?" "No kidding, we shot the actual opening in a school auditorium not so different from that," Gunn said to a tweet showing the sequence being reproduced for a high-school talent competition.

No kidding, we shot the actual opening in a school auditorium not so different from that. #Peacemaker https://t.co/S9IsLv8ReU

— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) March 26, 2022

Peacemaker has already been renewed for a second season, so fans will be interested to see what happens with the beginning dance sequence as fresh episodes air. Given that several of the characters from the original scene are no longer alive, such as Annie Chang's Detective Sophie Song and Robert Patrick's Auggie Smith, the sequence is likely to be re-choreographed and re-filmed. The launch date for Peacemaker season 2 has yet to be revealed, so fans may have to wait a while to watch more of John Cena's dance moves.

reco.title: Directors Who Should Direct Marvel’s Fantastic Four Movie
reco.excerpt: Let the speculation about who will direct what may be the most crucial MCU entry begin now that Jon Watts has now swung out his role helming the upcoming Fantastic Four film.

reco.title: Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man Originally Had Mechanical Web-Shooters
reco.excerpt: Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man possessed the ability to create webs, but he came close to using mechanical web-shooters in his film debut.

reco.title: Why Once Upon A Time In America Is One Of The Greatest Gangster Films Ever Made
reco.excerpt: Sergio Leone's mob masterwork, Once Upon a Time in America, featured Robert De Niro and James Woods as criminal figures.
